summary: ACPI: scan: Fix a memory leak in an error handling path
details:
ACPI: scan: Fix a memory leak in an error handling path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.38 by commit e2381174daeae0ca35eddffef02dcc8de8c1ef8a, it was introduced in version v5.10.27 by commit 4a5891992c680d69d7e490e4d0428d17779d8e85. For more details please see the references link.
